events.message: I just received my order, but the product is damaged and has several scratches on the surface.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect due to reported damage and scratches on the received item.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product specialists to assist you with the damaged item.
Hello, I am sorry to hear about the damaged item you received. Let me assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any damages on the product so we can evaluate the problem better?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches clearly on the product surface and the damaged corner.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement product immediately or issue a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement product because I still want to use this item. Please proceed with the replacement.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped out today. You should receive it within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement product arrived in good condition and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it looks perfect, no defects at all. Thank you very much for the help!
We are glad your issue has been resolved with the replacement. Closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us.
